settings.title: Reach out
settings.paragraph: Have a question? or have a service you need. Choose an option that suites you or send us an enquiry. Our team is ready to get you started.

settings.title: Team Match
settings.paragraph: Based on your enquiry we will assign a dedicated project manager matched to assist you, they take the time to ensure your needs are taken care of.

settings.title: Get started
settings.paragraph: You are in good hands. With your dedicated project manager, the sky is the limit, they will be there every step of the way to see that your project is complete.

settings.title: We create Shopify Ecommerce solutions.
settings.paragraph: Wether you want to built a new ecommerce store, migrate from a different platform, or need to upgrade your current site. We are here to help you succeed.

settings.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
settings.paragraph:
Our team focuses on optimizing your sites speed
by eliminating unnecessary form fields, placing clear calls-to-action and simplifying
your page navigations. We also perform A/B testing to ensure all aspects of
your website are optimized for conversion.

settings.title: We speak, eat, sleep Shopify
settings.paragraph: We have extensive Shopify experience and have developed ecommerce stores and Apps. We will start from the beginning including a discovery phase, content audit and sitemap planning. We will also highlight any specific needs or customizations you would like for your website. Your website includes product set-up and organization, with a fully operational & purchase ready Shopify store that is attractive, accessible, and user-friendly with a focus on high conversion rates.

settings.paragraph:

a site already, or the
need to connect it to a

settings.paragraph:

your ecommerce platform

settings.tab_paragraph: This is when we take the time to understand your vision & needs.
settings.title: Introduction & strategy phase
settings.paragraph: We are all ears and ready to get make your vision and ideas a reality. At this phase the more informatoin you share with us the better. We then put together a plan of action, specific to your requirements.

settings.tab_paragraph: We are dedicated in building your perfect website and encourage feedback throughout the project.
settings.title: Feedback stage
settings.paragraph: We put together some proposed mock-ups, and layouts for your website’s design and let you give us feedback until you are happy with the results.

settings.tab_paragraph: Our team gets to work on turning your vision into reality. Keeping you up to date in the process.
settings.title: Development stage
settings.paragraph: Wether its a store migration, website upgrate or a totally new website. Our team is on it. Ensuring that the development runs smoothly and effectively while keeping you updated throughout the process.

settings.tab_paragraph: Everything is coming together. We are finalizing the pieces of your website before we go live.
settings.title: Final ReviewStage
settings.paragraph: This phase is critical. Our team goes over the final round of revisions to get everything just right before we launch your site. We go over any changes and adjustments needed encouraging feedback throughout the process. Once every is a go, we move on to our next and final stage.

settings.tab_paragraph: All the hard work leads up to this, where we hand over your fully functional, ready to sell, Shopify site.
settings.title: Website Launch
settings.paragraph: We have made it and all the hard work has paid of. Our team guides you through the website launch process, ensuring that everything is functional and ready for you to start selling right away.

settings.title: We are here every step of the way
settings.paragraph: One of our main goals is to provide the best possible experience working with us, while developing your powerful website optimized for success. Whe nworking with us, you are matched with a designated project manager to ensure that your project needs are taken care of.

settings.title: Ready to start your Shopify project?
settings.paragraph: Shopify is more then just a E-commerce platform, and has so much to offer. In a nutshell it runs smoothly and provides great experience – for both store owners and their customers. Shopify is our eCommerce platform of choice that we've been working, developing, and consistently upgrading since 2017

settings.title: Why we choose Shopify
settings.paragraph: Over 1 million merchants across 175 countries agree with us and trust Shopify to run their stores. Here's why we think it's the right platform for you too...
settings.list:
Easy to use

Great support

Multi-payment gateway integration

Tracking and maintaining customer data

Across-channel selling

Analytics reporting

Built-in cart abandonment feature

Optimized for SEO, easily customizable keywords

Integrations made easy

settings.title: Why work with us
settings.paragraph:
Certified Shopify partner: Luna Lemon is a part of the Shopify development community.
Provide an all-in-one solution: We handle everything in-house, from developing and designing to advertising and maintaining your Shopify store.
Customized themes to fit your needs: We provide custom theme design that will convert visitors into buyers.
Dedicated project manager: We provide a dedicated point of contact at Luna Lemon to guide you through discovery, design, training, and final site launch.
Experts in eCommerce optimization: In addition to being expert web developers, we have a full staff of SEO Specialists who can optimize your online store for better rankings.

settings.title: No matter what platform you come from,
or what back-end you want to use.
